item.title: 澳大利亚交易所称正在调查结算问题
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd. ）表示，正在调查周五下午导致部分客户交易延迟的结算平台问题。【原文：ASX Ltd. said it’s investigating a problem with its settlement platform that caused a delay for some customers on Friday afternoon.】

item.title: 英国航空所有者 IAG 度过航空股艰难的一年
item.description: 对于欧洲航空业的投资者来说，今年是艰难的一年，波音公司的生产困境、发动机问题导致飞机停飞以及仍然低迷的企业旅游市场都对该行业造成了压力。【原文：It’s been a tough year for investors in European aviation, with Boeing Co.’s production woes, engine problems grounding aircraft and the still-sluggish corporate-travel market weighing on the sector.】

item.title: 梅洛尼时代正在解除意大利市场永远充满疑虑的魔咒
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼一直在努力实现她的前任意大利总理们长期以来一直在努力实现的壮举：赢得越来越多投资者的信任。【原文：Giorgia Meloni keeps managing a feat that her predecessors as Italian prime minister long struggled with: earning ever greater trust from investors.】

item.title: Calstrs 的支持使德国太阳能初创企业 1Komma5° 距离 IPO 更近了一步
item.description: 加利福尼亚州教师退休系统（California State Teachers' Retirement System）与其他几家美国和欧洲基金一起，正牵头为德国太阳能初创企业 1Komma5° 筹集 1.5 亿欧元（1.56 亿美元）的资金，使其更接近首次公开募股的目标。【原文：The California State Teachers’ Retirement System, along with several other US and European funds, is leading a €150 million ($156 million) financing round for German solar startup 1Komma5°, bringing it closer to a goal of holding an initial public offering.】

item.title: 屡遭骚扰指控后，SAP 晋升经理
item.description:
曾在科技巨头Signavio部门担任团队领导的女性表示，公司未能解决有关欺凌和歧视的投诉。SAP表示，公司对辱骂行为采取零容忍政策。【原文：

Women who worked for a team lead at the tech giant’s Signavio unit say that the company failed to address complaints of bullying and discrimination. SAP says it has a zero tolerance policy for abusive behavior. 

】

item.title: 以色列的多次战争催生了第一支由女教徒组成的战斗部队
item.description: 信教的女孩不属于战场。这是以色列大多数现代东正教团体的传统观点，年轻女性一般都会顺从这种观点。【原文：Religious girls don’t belong on the battlefield. That’s been the traditional view of most of Israel’s modern Orthodox community, and young women have generally gone along with it.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气贸易商惶惶不安，俄罗斯天然气流量问题愈演愈烈
item.description: 距离俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的过境协议到期还有不到两周的时间，欧洲天然气市场正准备迎接新年假期后的动荡交易。交易商们不会在 12 月 31 日狂欢，而是会刷新屏幕，查看头条新闻和电网数据，寻找最后一刻解决方案的线索。【原文：With less than two weeks left until a transit deal between Russia and Ukraine expires, Europe’s natural gas market is getting ready for turbulent trading after the New Year break. Instead of partying on Dec. 31, traders will be refreshing their screens to check headlines and grid data for clues on a last-minute solution — if there is one.】

item.title: 移除 Tether 使欧洲面临错失特朗普加密货币繁荣的风险
item.description: 即将在年底全面生效的欧盟加密资产法规已经在重塑一种重要的数字代币市场，这可能会削弱该集团对投资者的吸引力，而此时加密货币转换者唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正准备在美国就职。【原文：European Union cryptoasset regulations set to take full force at year-end are already reshaping the market for a key type of digital token, potentially weakening the bloc’s appeal to investors just as crypto convert Donald Trump gets ready to take office in the US.】

item.title: 交易乐观、成本削减是欧洲电信业实现突破的关键
item.description: 在过去十年的大部分时间里，欧洲电信股一直处于低迷状态，终于在 2024 年迎来了转机。【原文：Having spent most of the past decade in the doldrums, European telecommunications stocks finally turned a corner in 2024, and many analysts predict that the sector can maintain its new-found strength in the year ahead.】

item.title: 据说中国的海信明年将考虑 5 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，厦门锂电储能技术有限公司正在考虑最快于明年在香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：Xiamen Hithium Energy Storage Technology Co. is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 受制裁影响，伊朗海上储油量创五个月新高
item.description: 随着美国制裁范围的扩大，欧佩克产油国原油流向中国的渠道受阻，储存在海上油轮上的伊朗石油数量已增至 7 月下旬以来的最高水平。【原文：The volume of Iranian oil stored on tankers at sea has swelled to the highest level since late July, as broadening US sanctions disrupt flows of the OPEC producer’s crude to China.】

item.title: 澳大利亚示意铁矿石价格重返 100 美元以下，铁矿石走软
item.description: 由于澳大利亚政府预测铁矿石价格将大幅下跌，美元创下两年来的新高，交易商等待中国支持经济的下一步行动，因此铁矿石出现了周跌幅。【原文：Iron ore headed for a weekly loss, as Australia’s government forecast sharply lower prices, the US dollar hit a two-year high, and traders waited for China’s next move to support its economy.】

item.title: 中国海外投资增加，现金外流拖累人民币走势
item.description: 从汽车制造商到矿产商，中国企业正在加大海外支出，在外资外流的同时，人民币也承受着更大的压力。【原文：Chinese firms from carmakers to miners are ramping up their overseas spending, adding to pressure on the yuan amid an accompanying exodus of foreign capital.】

item.title: 菲律宾交易所的目标是 2025 年推出全球存托凭证
item.description: 菲律宾证券交易所计划在明年第一季度推出全球存托凭证交易，以吸引寻求海外更好股票回报的本地投资者的需求。【原文：The Philippine Stock Exchange plans to introduce trading of global depositary receipts in the first quarter of next year, in an effort to lure demand from local investors seeking better equity returns offshore.】

item.title: 中国政府在继续调查的同时向阿斯利康发出投资邀请
item.description: 北京市市长呼吁阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc）扩大在中国首都的研发投资，并表示针对该公司部分高管的调查不会影响与这家英国制药商的业务关系。【原文：Beijing’s mayor called on AstraZeneca Plc to expand its research and development investment in the Chinese capital, signaling that a probe against some of its executives won’t affect business ties with the UK drugmaker.】

item.title: 顶级期权市场的动荡使印度经纪商陷入低迷
item.description: 对于世界上最大的期权市场来说，2024 年是清算的一年。2025 年可能标志着它的成熟。【原文：For the world’s largest options market, 2024 was a year of reckoning. 2025 could mark its coming of age.】

item.title: 美元大涨，新兴市场国家央行加强货币防御
item.description: 从巴西到韩国，新兴市场的中央银行正在形成一道防线，因为美元上涨将这些国家的货币推到了多年来的低点。【原文：From Brazil to South Korea, emerging-market central banks are forming a line of defense as a rising dollar pushes their currencies to multi-year lows.】

item.title: 新加坡 V Medical Aesthetics 据称酝酿在马来西亚上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，总部位于新加坡的 V Medical Aesthetics Group 正在探讨在马来西亚进行首次公开募股，该公司的估值可能高达 60 亿林吉特（13 亿美元）。【原文：Singapore-based V Medical Aesthetics Group is exploring an initial public offering in Malaysia that could value the company at as much as 6 billion ringgit ($1.3 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 微信送礼工具刺激买盘，腾讯及相关股票大涨
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司和与该公司相关的股票周五大涨，投资者对其流行的微信平台上的新送礼功能热情高涨。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd and stocks linked to the company rallied on Friday, fueled by investor enthusiasm over a new gifting function on its popular WeChat platform.】

item.title: 印度卢比创新低，医药股受关注
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 前瑞银银行家阿戈斯蒂内利退出香港对冲基金 Ghisallo
item.description: 香港对冲基金 Ghisallo Capital Management 的董事总经理 Carlo Agostinelli 在离职一年多后离开了公司。【原文：Carlo Agostinelli, a managing director at hedge fund Ghisallo Capital Management in Hong Kong, has left the firm after just over a year, people with knowledge of the matter said, asking not to be identified because the information is private.】

item.title: 印尼卢比走软，印尼承诺 "大胆 "保护货币
item.description: 印尼央行对外汇市场进行干预，承诺大胆保护已跌至四个多月来最低点的印尼货币。【原文：Indonesia’s central bank intervened in the foreign-exchange market as it pledged to boldly guard the currency, which has fallen to the lowest in more than four months.】

item.title: 日本央行发表鸽派言论，日元跌势加剧，日本发出警告
item.description: 周五，日本央行行长暗示在加息前等待的时间可能比预期的要长，日元因此跌至五个月低点，随后日本加强了对货币投机的警告。【原文：Japan ramped up its warnings against currency speculation Friday after the yen slid to a five-month low following a hint from the central bank chief that he may wait longer than expected before raising interest rates.】

item.title: 美国扩大对油轮的制裁限制伊朗石油运输
item.description: 美国已经制裁了更多被指控参与伊朗石油贸易的油轮和公司，伊朗石油贸易产生的收入支持了德黑兰支持的民兵组织，如哈马斯和胡塞武装。【原文：The US has sanctioned more tankers and companies it alleges are involved in the trade of Iranian oil, which generates revenue that supports Tehran-backed militia groups such as Hamas and the Houthis.】

item.title: 据说 ING 将聘请前法国巴黎银行的 Kevin Sim 担任亚洲 FIG 交易主管
item.description: 荷兰国际集团（ING Groep NV）已聘请凯文-辛（Kevin Sim）担任其亚太区金融机构咨询业务主管。【原文：ING Groep NV has hired Kevin Sim, most recently of BNP Paribas SA, as head of its financial institutions advisory practice in Asia Pacific, as the Dutch bank seeks to beef up its investment banking team, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 俄罗斯准备在通胀之战中再次大幅加息
item.description: 由于俄罗斯央行在应对近期远高于预期的通胀率方面仍然收效甚微，俄罗斯准备在周五再次积极加息。【原文：Russia is poised for another aggressive rate hike on Friday as the central bank continues to find little success in tackling inflation that has recently accelerated well above its forecast.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长称，菲律宾可能在 2025 年降息开局
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）周五表示，菲律宾央行对在明年的首次货币政策会议上再次降息持开放态度。【原文：The Philippine central bank is open to delivering another rate cut in its first monetary policy meeting next year, Governor Eli Remolona said Friday.】

item.title: 中国一年期收益率自 2009 年以来首次降至 1
item.description: 由于交易商加大了对宽松货币政策的押注，中国短期债券收益率进一步下滑，自全球金融危机以来首次达到1%的心理里程碑。【原文：China’s short-term bond yields slumped further to reach the psychological milestone of 1% for the first time since the global financial crisis, as traders ramped up bets on monetary easing.】

item.title: 颠覆性的 10 分钟送货服务扩展到印度食品行业
item.description: 随着数字平台之间争夺急不可耐的消费者的竞争愈演愈烈，印度的食品外卖应用程序承诺在 10 分钟内将咖喱饭和热饮送到顾客家门口。【原文：Food delivery apps in India are promising to bring biryani to hot beverages at customers’ doorsteps in under 10 minutes, as competition for impatient consumers intensifies among digital platforms.】

item.title: 在创下 190 亿美元首次公开募股纪录后，印度又迎来了辉煌的一年
item.description: 印度已成为世界上首次公开募股等交易的主要市场之一，由于投资者抢占先机，印度今年的筹资额打破了历史纪录。【原文：India has become one of the world’s leading markets for deals such as initial public offerings, smashing its record for money raised this year as investors snap up opportunities.】
